data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Exposure and environmental choices such as smoking or drinking can easily lead to epigenetic changes. New ____ indicate ____ even ____ as ____ as ____ drinking ____ also ____ disease ____, ____ some ____ growths ____ suppressed ____ tea ____. More notable, these alterations seem confined to female populations.
data.partBlankContent: Exposure and environmental choices such as smoking or drinking can easily lead to epigenetic changes. New stu____ indicate th__ even some_____ as ba___ as t__ drinking m__ also modu____ disease ri__, wi__ some canc_____ growths be___ suppressed b_ tea consu______. More notable, these alterations seem confined to female populations.
data.answer: 接触和环境选择，如吸烟或饮酒，很容易导致表观遗传变化。新的研究表明，即使是像饮酒这样基本的事情也可能调节疾病风险，一些癌症生长可以通过喝茶抑制。更值得注意的是，这些变化似乎仅限于女性群体。
